text: @RepAdamSchiff @RepAdamSchiff. Just heard WH report USA is not going to participate in the WHO global conf. on a covid-19 vaccination. Why on GOD’S green earth would we not participate?It could help us! Is it bcuz tRump is having a hissy fit...again? Help !!!
